activities:
Websites operated by WorldVentures LLC may retain and process the personal information provided for purposes including the marketing, payment of sales commission and performance tracking. 

We may collect personally identifiable information including name, address, email address and phone number. We may record this information manually and/or electronically and act as the data controller for such information

WorldVentures may disclose and transfer personal information to other affiliates and associates of the WorldVentures group of companies which may be situated inside and outside of the EEA and to other persons for the purposes of WorldVentures’ business.
contactoff1: WorldVentures Compliance and Legal Affairs office
eucountries: Austria, Cyprus, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Slovenia, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personally identifiable information and aggregate information
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives
